item.title: Silent Network Authentication (SNA) at Signal 2022
item.description: OTP (One-Time Password) methods validate user authentication but the user experience is compromised. Users are sent a password which they then must enter to verify their identity. With SNA, the verification happens in the background for a seamless user experience. For Twilio Signal 2022, I created a demo iOS application that showcases SNA.
